bibl.title: Plutarch's Sympotic Forge and a Variant Reading in P.Oxy. LXXVIII 5156.
Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXXVIII, 5156 (= M.-P.3 1431.111; LDAB 3838). - The passage [Quaestiones Convivales 660 C, for which the papyrus reads τηρε[ῖ] instead of the mediaeval manuscripts' ποιεῖ, a varia lectio that affects the understanding of the metallurgical process described]. - The use of marble in ironworking. - Plutarch and metallurgy. - Absorption, extraction, and abstraction: Plutarch's convoluted imagery. - The variant. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: James Brusuelas & Chiara Meccariello, Plutarch's Sympotic Forge and a Variant Reading in P.Oxy. LXXVIII 5156.

P. Oxy. LXXVIII, 5156 (= M.-P.3 1431.111; LDAB 3838). - The passage [Quaestiones Convivales 660 C, for which the papyrus reads τηρε[ῖ] instead of the mediaeval manuscripts' ποιεῖ, a varia lectio that affects the understanding of the metallurgical process described]. - The use of marble in ironworking. - Plutarch and metallurgy. - Absorption, extraction, and abstraction: Plutarch's convoluted imagery. - The variant. - Avec résumé en anglais.
